The fear of long words is: Hippopotomonstrosesquippedaliophobia

The original, sesquipedalia verba, was first used by the Roman poet, Horace. Aimee Nezheukumatathil coined the term as we now it, in the year of our Lord 2000.

昨天发现我的EAF居然会意外的在Linux平台调用macOS平台的代码，当时忙，写了一个 monkey patch 临时顶上。

今天研究了一下，发现Git版本的Emacs的 display-graphic-p 这个函数挂了，即使用户用Emacs GUI也会返回 nil

写了一个新的补丁治本，以后不用脑袋里挂念着这个bug啦。

fullText:
You can’t outsource a squat.
No trainer, no friend, no device can take your place under that bar. Squats demand personal effort. They demand your strength, your commitment, your courage. Just like all the other worthwhile things in your life.
